author: Cercle
description:
Cercle Odyssey is taking shape.
As our first concerts in Mexico City are only 40 days away, every detail must align. 
Every movement, every sound, every light, perfectly synchronized.

In this episode, we dive deeper into the creative process, where passion meets precision. 
Where technology, music, and storytelling merge into one seamless experience. From the visuals to the immersive sounds, passing by the scent, we push the boundaries of what a live performance can be. We pursue perfection, repeating each take, refining every step, ensuring that across the world, the experience remains monumental.

ABOUT CERCLE ODYSSEY

Step into Cercle Odyssey, the world’s first large-scale 360-degree immersive nomad concert installation of its kind.

It isn't just a concert; it's a transformative experience. Each concert unfolds like a living painting with videos projected onto the walls and ceiling, all synchronized live with the music. Guided by the creative vision of Neels Castillon, our film
title: Behind Cercle Odyssey | Chapter Two: Synchronicity
